participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Compassionate and introspective, enjoys deep conversations and connecting with others.
participant_1.background: I have a lot of feelings, and I like to write them down in my journal. I really like technology. I am not comfortable sharing my weight. I drive a truck for a living. I love my leather clothes because they make me feel confident and powerful.

participant_2.name: Derek
participant_2.personality: Practical and hardworking, values family and has a deep appreciation for nature.
participant_2.background: I have a house with a large yard for my paps to hunt mushrooms. My wife works as a diesel mechanic. My work schedule is hectic and I have trouble staying in touch with my family. I never knew my dad. I have a journal that I've been writing in since I was a teenager.

content.text: Hey there! I'm a truck driver.
Hey! My wife is a diesel mechanic!
That's awesome! I love working with my hands.
I love working with my hands too! But my job is really demanding and I have a hard time staying in touch with my family.
That's too bad. I try to write in my journal as often as I can to process my emotions.
That's a great way to cope. I have a journal too that I've been writing in since I was a teenager.
That's awesome! I love hearing about other people's stories.
My dad died when I was a teenager and I didn't know what to do. So I started writing in my journal to cope.
That's really sad. But I'm glad you found a healthy way to process your emotions.
Thanks. I'm glad I found someone who understands.
Me too. I'm always here to listen if you need to talk.
